snippet: There were further indications on Friday of a gulf between the Islamists in Timbuktu and the main Tuareg rebel group in the rebellious northern region of Mali.
abstract: There were further indications on Friday of a gulf between the Islamists in Timbuktu and the main Tuareg rebel group in the rebellious northern region of Mali.

headline.main: Rift Appears Between Islamists and Main Rebel Group in Mali
